document_data.name: Gospoda-Veche
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gospoda-Veche''' was a large government building located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The building and surrounding compound was located in northeast Almorel along the [[Golden Way]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to serving as a meeting hall for the [[Gospoda]], the Gospoda-Veche was also one of Almorel's main armories.
